title: Google tests adding Lens to desktop Search on the web
content:
Google Lens today is primarily a visual lookup tool for mobile devices, but it’s been branching out to Chrome. The next expansion could see Google Search on the desktop web add Lens.

more…

The post Google tests adding Lens to desktop Search on the web appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Lens today is primarily a visual search tool on mobile. The next expansion could see Google Search on the desktop web add Lens...
